item.title: Cheat Sheet : Equivalent Codes in Julia, Matlab, Python, R
item.description: 개요 In this post, we’ll organize code that does the same thing in Julia, Matlab, Python, and R. Cheat Sheet: Flux-PyTorch-TensorFlow Let’s say we have the following environment for Python. import numpy as np Common Julia Matlab Python R comment #comment %comment #comment #comment 2d grid X = kron(x, ones(size(y)))Y = kron(ones(size(x)), y) [X,Y] = meshgrid(x,y) np.meshgrid(x,y) How to create an n-dimensional meshgrid in Julia Type Julia Matlab Python
